title: I cant do anything at all in game
body: I just lost a ranked game because when I died I couldn't do anything. Couldn't move, type, open shop nothing. I tried restarting the game multiple times and nothing worked

Hey, sorry to hear this happened. I'm going to forward this to the relevant team to check out. We've identified an issue between our game and the Discord overlay, and working towards a fix.

I can offer two potential workarounds:
 - Disable Discord overlay
 - Try enabling/disabling the overlay whilst you're in-game with the issue (default keybind is Shift+`, and you can verify this in Discord's settings under App Settings -> Overlay -> Toggle overlay lock)
